title: Tidy Tuesday, 29 September 2021
description: A short description of the post.
contents: Through the creation of my bar graph above, I wanted to see if there were certain distributors that were leading in the 2021 Emmy nominations. In my visualization, I graphed the top 15 media distributors with the most nominations. With 26 of their shows nominated, Netflix leads the pack, with HBO, CBS, and NBC following.

title: This is my first ever blog post!
contents: Thanks for paying my page a visit! In the future, look out for weekly Tidy Tuesday Exercises and all other things related to Advanced Data Science. The picture above is of a sunset I saw in small town called Alma in Wisconsin.
